scripts.build: pnpm clean && ncc build src/index.ts -o dist && babel dist --out-dir dist && cp -r images dist && cp -r plugin.json dist
scripts.package: pnpm build && cd dist && zip -r ../replace_me_with_name.wox *.js *.json images
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch images --watch plugin.json --ext json,ts,js,mjs,png --exec pnpm run build
scripts.clean: node -e "var { rmdirSync, existsSync } = require('fs'), path = require('path'); ['./dist'].forEach(fPath => {if (existsSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath))) rmdirSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath), { recursive: true })}); process.exit(0);"
